p: According to the authors of [ 2], flavonoids were able to block the virus RNA synthesis, and the antiviral activity appeared to be associated to these compounds, and hydroxylation at the 3-position is apparently a prerequisite for antiviral activity. For example, quercetin reduced viral particle productions of herpes simplex virus type 1, poliovirus type 1, parainfluenza virus type 3, and respiratory syncytial virus [ 26].
